FirstHeberg, specialist in shared hosting, vps and dedicated servers, proposes 2 full ranges of cheap and efficient VPS.


A VPS allows you to manage your own server with a root or a manager access located in a shared and secure infrastructure.


For the summer period, FirstHeberg offers a discount of 20% ON ALL THE VPS, available FOREVER, with the coupon code FHSUMMER.


For any additional information, feel free to go on our website www.firstheberg.com or to contact us at contact@firstheberg.com.
